title: For science and the arts
brief_description: A rare distinction for outstanding achievements in science or art is selection to the exclusive German Order “Pour le Merite”, limited to 30 German and 30 foreign artists and scientists. Shows distinguished members and outstanding scientific and artistic achievements of the 19th and 20th centuries. In English and German language.
